response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This exceptional item holds significant value to you, estimated at $800,000. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000, hoping to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.
